item.description:
We'll meet at the trailhead of Skookumchuck (the parking lot on US 3 that serves the north end of the Franconia Notch bike path). There we'll leave a couple of cars, then drive over to where we'll begin our hike on Garfield Trail.

Details to follow....

But bare minimum is if you want to bag both Garfield and Lafayette it's a total of 13.6 miles. I believe it is fair to say that this is an advanced hike. Garfield Ridge Trail is described as "the footway is rough - more difficult than one might gather from a glance at the map" in the AMC book.

We've stayed many a night at Galehead hut and there isn't a day hiker from Greenleaf to Galehead who would not wholeheartedly agree with that statement.
item.how_to_find_us: two-toned dark grey Subaru Outback, bike racks on roof
item.name: Path less traveled - Lafayette & Garfield via Skookumchuck
